text: After I m goneI understand what will happen after I am gone  The pain my death would cause for my family and friends  I get that my passing will cause a great sadness in my loved ones  and that might not seem fair  Some people even consider it selfish to knowingly inflict that pain on others just to end my own  I think the difference is that the pain I leave behind has a cause  It would have a clear origin  me  and therefore can be lessened and coped with  whereas my chemical imbalance is impossible to reason with  I can t win with my type of depression  but I think they could have much better luck with theirs

text: Go play Ocarina of Time I love this game so fucking much  I had heard about it for so long  people singing its praises  hailing it as the greatest game of all time  I had only played one Zelda game at the time  breath of the wild  and had sunk countless hours into it  so I thought another Zelda game would give me just as great of an experience  So in January of   I went to my local video shop  Shoutout to Play It Trade It Games Movies Music if you re in the Columbus area  and picked up an N  along with the cartridge for about   I played it and wow  Instantly became one of my top   games  In a word  the game is charming  Some may call the game dated but I disagree  If you like videogames at all  go play the game  If you have an N  go get the cart  if you have a  DS  go pick up the remaster  Even you don t have either of those systems  I recommend picking one up  You are doing yourself a disservice by not playing this beautiful  amazing  and nearly perfect piece of art  Go play The Legend of Zelda  Ocarina of Time
summary: Go play Ocarina of Time. If you have an N you should get the cart and if you have a DS you should pick up the remaster. It's one of the top games of all time.
